title: Preparation and demulsification performance of magnetic demulsifier Fe3N@F
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31730-31739
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05569A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chao Liu, Xinlei Jia, Yonghui Wang, Yanjuan Liu, Weining Qin, Lixin Wei
By observing the microdroplet microstructure before and after demulsification, it is found that the Fe3N@F magnetic demulsifier exhibits favorable coalescence, flocculation, and bridging capabilities.
